newsitem.title: UK: SOCCER-ASPRILLA SET FOR SHOWDOWN WITH NEWCASTLE BOSS.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-ASPRILLA SET FOR SHOWDOWN WITH NEWCASTLE BOSS.

text.p: Faustino Asprilla was due to arrive back in Britain on Saturday and will be heading for showdown talks with his Newcastle manager Kevin Keegan.
The Colombian was reported to be booked on a London-bound flight from Bogota.
Keegan, preparing his team for their Engish premier league game at Derby, wants to know why his 7.5 million pounds ($11.81 million) player is two days late.
Asprilla scored Colombia's winner in their World Cup game aganst Ecuador on Wednesday and was expected to return to London immediately after the game.
Bad weather delayed the scheduled flight but he was not on the next available plane.
Keegan said on Friday that he did not know of Asprilla's whereabouts and ruled him out of the Derby game.
Now Keegan must consider whether to include him in the Newcastle squad which leaves for Hungary on Monday for the UEFA Cup game against Ferencvaros on Tuesday.
